title: Law Enforcement Agencies Need to Improve AI Literacy to Handle Crime
description: 'One of the challenges for us in the future is how we responsibly and ethically start to build our AI literacy,' said Matthew Rippon, the acting CEO of ACIC.

title: Warner Music Settles AI Copyright Dispute, Partners with Suno
description: Warner Music Group (WMG) has agreed a licensing deal with AI music platform Suno, ending a year-long copyright lawsuit over the use of its artists’ work. The agreement allows Suno users to create AI-generated songs using the voices, names and likenesses of Warner artists who opt in. WMG represents acts including Coldplay, Ed Sheeran and... Read More

title: How to Use the StudyAgent AI Detector: A Step-by-Step Guide

title: Decoding home air purifiers, SaveSage’s AI saves you money, and Toyota’s tem museum
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor has opened doors to “tem”, or the Toyota experiential museum, in India (yes, “tem”—lowercase, because aesthetics).

title: Google Messages Comes Alive With “Remix” Image Editing Powered by Gemini AI
description: Google Messages has a Remix feature which tweaks images in the chat window using Gemini AI text prompts for creative, fun-filled conversations.
